resources.string: How will the blind cat find the litter box?

That has never been a problem, the cats rely on scent and memory to find the litter box. I have had to move it several times over the years and Jett has never had a problem finding it after I showed him one time where it was.
How can a blind cat find food and water?

That has also never been an issue. It is recommended that a water fountain is used, hearing the water will remind the cat to drink. Jett and Merry have also figured out how to get treats out of puzzle towers.

When Jett and Merry were first brought to the vet, she told us not to rearrange the furniture too much, they would be stressed out over the new obstacles in their path. We have found that the furniture is not an issue. A much bigger issue are the everyday obstacles, shoes and clothes on the floor, grocery bags, mail, purses put on the floor and counter. It\'s the little things that need to be monitered and put away immediately
Jett was rescued with 17 other kittens in an abandoned trailer.
He was adopted with his brother, Shadow, as a bonded pair.
He is very cautious, when changing levels he needs to be able to reach down and touch the next surface. He doesn\'t just blindly jump off a surface unless he has too.
Jett loves going for walks in the stroller. Care needs to be taken becasue he is startled by loud noises, like lawnmowers.
Jett doesn\'t care for wet cat food, he prefers dry cat food but moist treats.
His eyes have not been sown shut, he uses them when making facial expressions.
Merry was rescued from a dumpster with her siblings. They all had eye infections but hers did not get better with treatment. The vet removed her eyes to save her life.
Merry can climb anything as long as she has a clear path.
She is a complete snuggle bug!!
She loves toys. She likes everything - wand toys, catnip, ball and track toys and cat treat puzzles.
Merry always lets you know when she is hungry.
Going for a walk with Tabby
